Articles.Content:
This is my first post and i wanted to show my first ever Mun landing!!!

I Did Use mods : Novapunch,MechJeb

P.s I only used MechJeb For the Accent Stage

Here is a link to the pics--> http://imgur.com/a/m1lsh

Edited August 26, 2012 by bprplane
Put The Link In
Good Job im still learning how to tell retoburn and proburn :3
lol yeh it took me a while to work that out too:D

I tried to do manual landing from jun orbit...I crashed. So I returned to my last quick save and tried to land with mech jeb...it landed on a steep slope and fell over. I wanted to load my last quick save back in orbit so I could choose a better landing site except I accidentaly quick saved once i landed. When loaded my quick save it fell over, so I loaded again and it fell over. After the the eighteenth time I was cracking up because every tim e I loaded it jeb would have no expression what so ever and bill and bob were craping their pants.

That my fellow kerbalnauts...is mun landing.
Lol A similar thing happened to me when I tried to land my Mun orbit went funny I reloaded the quick save and i was back on the pad!
I must say congratulations! I take a lot of hard work to land on the moon. Keep up the good work.

I must say congratulations! I take a lot of hard work to land on the moon. Keep up the good work.

Thanks !
